Instruction: Cook melted butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Whisk in flour until smooth, and continue to cook and stir until the mixture turns a light, golden, sandy color, approximately 7 minutes.

Raise the heat to medium-high and gradually blend in milk until the mixture thickens. Let it gently simmer, then lower the heat to medium-low and simmer until the flour has cooked and the texture is smooth, approximately 10 to 20 minutes.
Add salt and nutmeg to season.
